           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar for Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10101170">
          <div id="boxatt10101170" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10101170">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10473260">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10473260">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10473260">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10473260">
          <div id="boxatt10473260" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12730852">
              <a id="link_12730852" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12730852,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730852}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Largely full text database of scholarly and trade journals covering all aspects of accounting, business, and economics. Full text journals include, among many others, the Harvard Business Review (1985-present, including all cases originally published in the Review), Academy of Management Journal, Accounting Review, and Journal of Marketing. Also includes several hundred in-depth reports on publicly traded companies. To access, click on the Company Profiles tab at the top of Business Source Complete.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25097940">
              <a id="link_25097940" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=bsh&amp;jid=B7OA&amp;site=ehost-live" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25097940,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25097940}); ">
               Business Week
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Top-flight business periodical.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12730866">
              <a id="link_12730866" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/econlitshell/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12730866,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730866}); ">
               EconLit
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to scholarly publications in economics. Links out to other library databases, and to interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12730371">
              <a id="link_12730371" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12730371,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730371}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of peer-reviewed journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago. Well over 400 journals specific to the study of business and economics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23376359">
              <a id="link_23376359" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://intelliconnect.cch.com/scion/auth.jsp?disableAutoLogin=true&amp;wksso=false" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23376359,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23376359}); ">
               IntelliConnect (CCH)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Users must possess a valid Muhlenberg email address, and create an account. IntelliConnect provides unlimited access to federal and state tax information plus explanations, analysis and practice aids. Includes daily tax news, FASB materials, as well as GAAP and GAAS guides.
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/Intelliconnect.pdf">
                User guide
               </a>
               .
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10473261">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10473261">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10473261">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           More Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10473261">
          <div id="boxatt10473261" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12730374">
              <a id="link_12730374" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12730374,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link13706517">
              <a id="link_13706517" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=hch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13706517,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13706517}); ">
               HealthSource
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Includes full text articles in the area of healthcare economics and management.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12854219">
              <a id="link_12854219" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=psyh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12854219,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326504}); ">
               PsycINFO
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and professional journals and books in psychology and related areas.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12731005">
              <a id="link_12731005" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://online.sagepub.com/cgi/search" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12731005,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12731005}); ">
               Sage Journals Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of key journals in management and organizational behavior.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20045591">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20045591">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20045591">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           News Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20045591">
          <div id="boxatt20045591" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23403832">
              <a id="link_23403832" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23403832,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23403832}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News and financial database. Most major newspapers from around the world are full text, updated daily. Includes company dossiers, complete with ample financial data from a variety of sources.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23599448">
              <a id="link_23599448" href="http://www.nytimes.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23599448,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23599448}); ">
               New York Times
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Complete access to New York Times via Muhlenberg subscription. All users must register while physically on campus, using their Muhlenberg email. Contact refdesk@muhlenberg.edu with any questions.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23403842">
              <a id="link_23403842" href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/publication/10482" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23403842,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23403842}); ">
               Wall Street Journal via Proquest 1984 to present
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. The "paper of record" of the business world. Proquest version contains full text archive 1923-today. No charts or graphs
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25091451">
              <a id="link_25091451" href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/publication/45441" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25091451,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25091451}); ">
               Wall Street Journal via Proquest 1923-1998
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. The "paper of record" of the business world. Proquest version contains full text archive 1923-today. No charts or graphs
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
